original_text: While he was still speaking, Judas, one of the Twelve, arrived. With him was a large crowd armed with swords and clubs, sent from the chief priests and the elders of the people.
korean_text: 말씀하실 때에 열둘 중의 하나인 유다가 왔는데 대제사장들과 백성의 장로들에게서 파송된 큰 무리가 칼과 몽치를 가지고 그와 함께 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Judas, one of the Twelve, arrived
sentences.korean_translation: 열두 제자 중 하나인 유다가 도착했다

sentences.original_text: With him was a large crowd
and the elders of the people
